1th.Heading: What is Fotron?
1th.Text: Fotron is a marketplace, which is used by different projects for ERC20 token sales. Our platform shares common principles of tokens distribution, which are anchored on open and audited smart-contract:

List.1th: Escrow - holding TRX tokens that were received from selling of other tokens with the possibility of reverse selling until lockup period ends.
List.2th: Referral system - we pay TRX rewards for recruiting new customers.
List.3th: Liquidity and pricing - depends on made purchases and returns, the price is dynamically changing and displayed in TRX equivalent. It is possible to buy back all previously sold tokens as well.
List.4th: Gamification - token buyers receive extra bonuses pegged to the point of purchase.

2th.Heading: Is it just another Ponzi scheme?
2th.Text: No, it is not. We don’t use invested capital for the rewards. For that purposes we use fees added on purchase and sale of tokens inside of smart-contract. Invested deposits of TRX are held as demand deposits for buyers.

3th.Heading: How does Fotron work?
3th.Text:
A project with the platform access deposits chosen amount of tokens into smart-contract; sets opening price in TRX, which is impossible to drop lower; sets a lockup period during which assets will be frozen in smart-contract.

Investors buy tokens of any project they choose by sending TRX to a smart-contract through the platform.

Token pricing is calculated upon a complex formula that increases it on each purchase and decreases on each selling.

Investors pay fees (from 1% to 10%) on each purchase and sale. The amount of fee depends on the deal size: bigger deals - higher fees.

The process is reversible: investors may turn back purchased tokens into TRX in compliance with the actual price at any point of lockup period. Investors may keep tokens or sell them on any crypto exchange. It is also possible to buy tokens on a crypto exchange and sell them into the smart-contract, but no more than their platform purchases volume.

The project is able to receive funds from the smart-contract (unsold tokens and/or TRX) after the lockup period ends.

4th.Heading: Is it safe to use Fotron?
4th.Text: We use open source smart-contract that can be validated. There is no access to the funds stored in smart-contract, even for the founders of Tron platform. The code-review report is available on our Github page.

5th.Heading: How is the fee calculated?
5th.Text:
- Fee on purchase = (price of the token after transaction minus current price)/2;

- Fee on sale = (current price minus price of the token after transaction)/2.

6th.Heading: How fees are distributed?
6th.Text: Trading fees are distributed in a following scheme:

List.4th: 5% – to QUICK promo Jackpot pool (paid once in each 20 minutes, if transaction is in hundredth block of Tron);
List.5th: 5% – to BIG promo Jackpot pool (paid once in 3 days, if transaction fits any 9999th block of Tron);

7th.Heading: How tokens’ prices will change?
7th.Text:
Prices of tokens in TRX equivalent will be changing upon following formulas:

For purchase: P1 = T * P0 * exp (TS), where T is the number of tokens purchased, P0 is the current price of the token in TRX, P1 is the price of the token in TRX after the transaction, S is the rate of price increase (eg, 0.05 / 10,000 - price increase of 5% for every 10,000 tokens);

For selling: P1 = T * P0 * exp (-TS).

8th.Heading: Why should I use Fotron platform?

Items.1th: Unlike in case of ICO participation, users of Fotron don’t need to wait exchange listing to sell tokens. There is the minimal price, which can’t be dropped lower.

List2.Heading: There are several ways of earning money:

Items.1th: Buy cheap (at the start of purchasing period), sell at high price (in the beginning of selling period);
Items.2th: Win a Jackpot while purchasing tokens;
Items.3th: Earn 2% referral rewards by bringing new users to the platform;
Items.4th: Earn by holding funds on the platform – 3% of all fees amount are distributing among token holders proportionately to their balance;
Items.5th: Make profit on arbitraging the price difference of token among Fotron and crypto exchanges.

9th.Heading: What does Fotron give to projects?

List.1th: It may increase community knowingness of token and the number of investors. Listing on Fotron means that the project has a certain level of quality.
List.2th: It is another sales channel where some extra volume of tokens may be sold.
List.3th: It is possible to earn extra 3,5% of every token sold.

9th.Text: Post-ICO projects may additionally protect interests of their early investors by allowing them to buy through Fotron platform less or the same amount of tokens as they bought during ICO.

List.2th: Providing regular support of users and project teams via Telegram chat.
List.4th: Providing legislative framework to users and project teams.

FAQ.Heading: FAQ
FAQ.Support: If you didn't find the answer to your question in our FAQ, send us an email

1th.Heading: Does the smart-contract have open source?

2th.Heading: How to buy tokens with a referral link?
2th.Text: With every purchase of tokens, a new account is created in the smart-contract. That account’s number corresponds to private key’s number of your wallet, thus, only the owner of private key has the access to that cell.

3th.Heading: I have tokens that I’ve bought on a crypto exchange. May I take a part in reward distribution?
3th.Text: No. You have to buy tokens through the Fotron’s smart-contract, to receive a part of rewards distribution.

4th.Heading: How can I be sure that you will not steal the money?
4th.Text: You should read smart-contract settings and the results of audition.

5th.Heading: Is it possible to buy tokens, get your referral link, and sell the tokens right after?
5th.Text: Yes, it is possible. Thus, you will be able to get a referral reward only. To get other types of rewards, you have to hold tokens in your Fotron wallet.

6th.Heading: Where do the reward’s percent goes, if tokens were bought directly with no use of referral links?
6th.Text: In that case, the reward will be added to token holders bonus fund.

7th.Heading: Does a referral reward go to my Tron wallet automatically?
7th.Text: No. All of the referral rewards are accumulating in self-regulated smart-contract. To get your reward, you have to make a request to the smart-contract through MetaMask authorization on the platform.

8th.Heading: I have lost access to my Tron wallet, on which I made purchases through the smart-contract. What should I do?
8th.Text: There is nothing you can do.

9th.Heading: What is the minimal amount of tokens I have to buy to start participating in the referral program?
9th.Text: Each token has its own minimal margins for that amount.

10th.Heading: Is it possible to make my own web-page containing Fotron project information and post there my referral link?
10th.Text: For sure! We support Fotron’s promotion throughout the World Wide Web, if the information spread correctly without any distortions. On the other side, we strongly act against the spread of incorrect and distorted information about rules and conditions of the Fotron project.

11th.Heading: Fotron fees
11th.Text: Small fees paid on each trade, as well as the gas costs, which is possible to set manually during a trade. On minor transactions, the percentage of gas costs might be high. We recommend to set gas price manually and to avoid numerous minor transactions.

MainModal.Heading: FOTRON QUICK TOUR
MainModal.Slide1: The platform for the ERC-20 tokens distribution which based on a smart contract with a back sale guarantee.
MainModal.Slide2: TRX reward from every purchase / sale for all token holders.
MainModal.Slide3: The additional remuneration in TRX for attracting users by referral link.
MainModal.Slide4: The possibility of a super bonus obtaining while buying tokens.

TronLink.Heading: To continue you'll need to have TronLink
TronLink.Text: TronLink is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Tron dApps right in your browser without running a full Tron node. Please, install the TronLink add-on in Chrome, Firefox or Opera browser. Get TronLink

LoginToMM.Text: Please login to your account or approve access to the Tron blockchain

POPOVER.MyBalances: The current value of all your tokens purchased on the Fotron platform in TRX
POPOVER.MyBonus: Your total earned bonus including your share bonus, referral bonus and promotional bonuses received
POPOVER.BigBank: You can get this big promo bonus if your transaction turns out to be the first in each block whose number is a multiple of 9999
POPOVER.QuickBank: You can get this promo bonus if your transaction turns out to be the first in each block whose number is a multiple of 100
POPOVER.PercentBtnBuy: Amount of TRX for the active TronLink wallet for which you want to buy tokens
POPOVER.PercentBtnSell: Amount of tokens for the active TronLink wallet for which you want to sell tokens
POPOVER.TokenFee: Size of the Fotron's commission excluding the cost of gas per transaction
POPOVER.AveragePrice: Calculated average token price of the deal
POPOVER.EstimateBuy: The minimum amount of tokens you will receive as soon as the transaction is confirmed
POPOVER.EstimateSell: The minimum amount of TRX you will receive as soon as the transaction is confirmed
